summary: The Snow Water Supply Forecasting Reauthorization Act of 2025 amends the Snow Water Supply Forecasting Program Authorization Act. It focuses on improving snowpack measurement and integrated modeling technologies. Key changes include emphasizing the deployment of integrated snowpack measuring and modeling technologies, updating data collection methods with advanced technologies like airborne laser altimetry and imaging spectroscopy, and focusing on activities that enhance forecasting results, integrate real-time data, and support water management decisions. The bill also reauthorizes funding for fiscal years 2027-2031.
